original_text: The armies of Ethiopia and Libya were very large. They had lots of chariots and soldiers who rode on horses. But you trusted the Lord when they attacked you, and he put them under your power.
korean_text: 구스 사람과 룹 사람의 군대가 크지 아니하며 말과 병거가 심히 많지 아니하더이까 그러나 왕이 여호와를 의지하였으므로 여호와께서 왕의 손에 넘기셨나이다

sentences.original_text: The armies of Ethiopia and Libya were very large
and soldiers who rode on horses
But you trusted the Lord when they attacked you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들이 당신을 공격할 때 주를 신뢰했습니다

sentences.original_text: and he put them under your power
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그분은 그들을 당신의 권세 아래 두셨습니다
